subject: p14851532
History: Year old man with effusion, effusion f/u.
Impression: Hyperinflation indicates COPD. And, previous pulmonary vascular congestion and mild pulmonary edema have both cleared. Lobulation at the apex of the left hemi thorax along the mediastinal border is residual of slowly resolving hematoma. Small bilateral pleural effusions are also resolving. Heart size normal.
